Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.3.0
Messages: Collect more signal related values for all network types.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.4
Messages: Fix crash when app database is corrupted.
Fix crash on buggy phones incorrectly reporting number of active SIM cards.
Fix wrong shortcut usage reported to the system causing wrong one selected as the most commonly used.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.3
Messages: Fix GPS Week Number Rollover on devices manufactured between 2006 and 2016.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.2
Messages: Fix crash due to inconsistency when exporting to GPX file.
Fix crash when collecting on some Xiaomi phones.
